text: Poullaouen () is a commune. It is found in the region Brittany in the Finistère department in the northwest of France. On 1 January 2019, Locmaria- Berrien became a part of the commune of Poullaouen.Arrêté préfectoral 1 December 2018 == References == Category:Communes in Finistère
title: Poullaouen
